verse: I cried to the Lord in my trouble, and He answered me.
O Lord, save me from lying lips and a false tongue.
What will be given to you and what more will be done to you, you false tongue?
He will punish you with sharp arrows of the soldier, and with the hot fire of the broom tree.
It is bad for me, for I travel in Meshech and live among the tents of Kedar!
I have lived too long with those who hate peace.
I am for peace. But when I speak, they are for war.
